name: Canine Cupid
description: OG concept for Canine Cupid, later stripped and redisgned to Canine Cupid v2 in 6 days.

name: Canine Cupid V.2
description: Work in progress build of Canine Cupid, currently working on optimizing for tablets/phone screens, with tons of other features in the works.

name: Cocktail HQ
description: This webpage was my first exposure to deploying BE repo's to Heroku, major API calls, routes, modals, controllers, etc. The front end is deployed on Github pages and optomization is in it's future!

name: IPA's using API's
description: IPA's using API's was our first group project, it showcases my skills with HTML, CSS, and Javascript at a very begginer level using two different API's we were able to track geolocation of a given city as well as store wish list items in local storage.

name: Logan Portfolio
description: React application, displaying my past projects and detailing my current skills. In this application I make use of props, state, functional components, useEffect (starting with React 16.9.0) , React Map function to map through json array, both inline styles, styles from props, and styles from CSS

name: API Weather App
description: Here we have another example of my ability to quickly render API data for any given search as well as present it to the user in a structured yet sleek manner

name: Team Generator
description: Software team generator using the command line, this application prompts the user for information about thier team (position, id # , graduate school) and the generates and HTML file with said information

name: Book Club
description: 'Born to Read' is a Book Club that allows participants to read books, review books, and buy books as well as the ability to look at other's reviews of the books to optomize the likely hood of a regretless purchase. It is a space dedicated to book fanatics who love to share their reading experiences with others.

name: Dream Vacation
description: This application's function is centered around a user's desire to plan for an upcoming vacation. The application is designed so that upon input of a city and click of the search button different types of information used for the user's vacation planning will populate based on what data is present within two specific API databases.

name: Coding Quiz
description: As any great web developer knows, as you proceed through your career, you will often be asked to take an assessment of you coding knowledge. This usually consists of  a combination of multiple-choice questions and interactive challenges. Using HTML, CSS, AND JS, I have created a a multiple choice application that will quiz the user on their knowledge of various languages. I have added a leaderboard for those truly skilled in the ways of Web Dev and a time for added pressure.
